title: Thierry Mugler, Visionary French Fashion Designer, Dies at 73
sub_head: Known for an architectural style of haute couture, the designer created looks for stars including David Bowie, Grace Jones and Diana Ross
body:
Manfred Thierry Mugler, the french fashion designer who dressed celebrities including Beyonce, Lady Gaga and Kim Kardashian, has died at age 73.
He died Sunday, a statement posted to his official Instagram account said. “May his soul Rest In Peace,” it said in an all black post with no image.
